title: Maid’s Diary: Devil Master, Please Behave - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Josei   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Cute Story   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Identity   Maids
author: Yi Wan Yue   一弯月
description: Everyone knows that Gu Yuze has a very handsome assistant. The ultimate bad boy, Gu Yuze is known for his arrogant and eccentric behavior. The assistant helps to deal with Gu Yuze's ex, reconcile the estrangement between Gu Yuze and his father, and even fight against gangsters. This mysterious assistant always cleans up Gu Yuze's messes. Until one day, people suddenly find that Gu Yuze is in love with his assistant, and the assistant is actually a girl.>
